p: The details of components of the 1st version (version A) have been described previously [ 25]. Briefly, the rapid IC RDT incorporated two mouse anti-CHIKV MAbs: CK47 was immobilized onto the membrane at the test line and used for CHIKV antigen-capture; CK119 was conjugated to AuNPs and placed at the conjugated pad by TANAKA Kikinzoku Kogyo K. K, Japan. The 2nd (versions B, C, D, E, F, M, N) and 3rd (version O) -generation IC RDTs were assembled with the combinations of MAbs shown in TableÂ 1.
